Rulings.Tengu:
● “Battling” requires this card to be involved in Damage Calculation
(If this card's attack is negated, the ② effect can't activate).
● If multiple “Gladiator Beast” effects are activated at the end of the Battle Phase, 
they don’t go on the same Chain (they each activate, one after another, each on their own Chain).
Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg

Rulings.Cat:
● See 'Gladiator Beast Alexander' for additional rulings.
● If “Gladiator Beast Secutor” attacks or is attacked and it is flipped face-down or removed from the field before the end of the Battle Phase, it will not be able to activate its effect to Special Summon 2 “Gladiator Beast” monsters from the Deck, even if it is returned to the field or flipped face-up before the end of the Battle Phase.
● When you activate the effect of “Gladiator Beast Secutor” and you have only 1 available Monster Zone Space, you will still choose 2 “Gladiator Beast” monsters. You will choose one of the selected monsters and Special Summon it, and the other is destroyed and sent to the GY.
● If you activate the effect of “Gladiator Beast Secutor” and when resolving the effect you only have 1 “Gladiator Beast” monster that you can Special Summon, the effect of “Gladiator Beast Secutor” disappears and you will verify with your opponent by briefly revealing your Deck.

Rulings.Base:
1. See "Gladiator Beast Alexander" for additional rulings.
2. If "Gladiator Beast Secutor" attacks or is attacked and it is flipped face-down or removed from the field before the end of the Battle Phase, it will not be able to activate its effect to Special Summon 2 'Gladiator Beast' monsters from the Deck, even if it is returned to the field or flipped face-up before the end of the Battle Phase.
3. When you activate the effect of "Gladiator Beast Secutor" and you have only 1 available Monster Zone Space, you will still choose 2 'Gladiator Beast' monsters. You will choose one of the selected monsters and Special Summon it, and the other is destroyed and sent to the GY.
4. If you activate the effect of "Gladiator Beast Secutor" and when resolving the effect you only have 1 'Gladiator Beast' monster that you can Special Summon, the effect of "Gladiator Beast Secutor" disappears and you will verify with your opponent by briefly revealing your Deck.

PSCT.Tengu:
① If this card, Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, battled, 
at the end of the Battle Phase:
Special Summon 2 "Gladiator Beast" monsters from your Deck (except "Gladiator Beast Secutor").
